globalHeaders.content-security-policy: default-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://*.azurestaticapps.net https://*.azure.com https://*.microsoft.com https://login.microsoftonline.com; img-src 'self' data: https://*.azurestaticapps.net; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://*.azurestaticapps.net; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' https://*.azurestaticapps.net
